exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.description: A basic bodyweight exercise targeting the chest and triceps.

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.description: An advanced bodyweight exercise for the back and biceps.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: A fundamental exercise that targets the thighs, hips, and buttocks.

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.description: A high-intensity exercise combining a squat, jump, and push-up.

exercises.name: Lunge
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that targets the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: A core-strengthening exercise that also engages the shoulders and back.

exercises.name: Mountain Climber
exercises.description: A cardio exercise that simulates climbing a mountain with alternating knee drives.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the back, glutes, and legs.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps.

exercises.name: Tricep Dip
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the triceps and shoulders.

exercises.name: Leg Raise
exercises.description: A core exercise focusing on the lower abs.

exercises.name: Jumping Jack
exercises.description: A classic cardio exercise involving jumping while spreading arms and legs.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Row
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the back and biceps, performed using a rowing machine or barbell.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.description: A core exercise that works the obliques by twisting the torso.

exercises.name: Chest Fly
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the chest using dumbbells.

exercises.name: Cable Pullover
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the lats and chest using a cable machine.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: A dynamic exercise that targets the glutes, hips, and core.

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.description: An exercise that focuses on the glutes, performed by thrusting the hips upward.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the shoulders and triceps using dumbbells or a barbell.

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the rear deltoids and upper back.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the glutes and hamstrings while lying on the back.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: A variation of the plank that focuses on the oblique muscles.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: A cardio exercise that improves coordination and endurance.

exercises.name: Burpee Box Jump
exercises.description: A high-intensity exercise combining a burpee with a box jump for added challenge.
